heading: HR00749
0: A RESOLUTION URGING AIRLINE COMPANIES AND TRAVEL AGENCIES TO ALLOW PASSENGERS WHO BOOKED FLIGHTS TO COUNTRIES WITH CASES OF CORONAVIRUS DISEASE (COVID-19) TO REBOOK OR REFUND THEIR SCHEDULED FLIGHTS FOR FREE
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2020-03-04
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00749
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING AIRLINE COMPANIES AND TRAVEL AGENCIES TO ALLOW PASSENGERS WHO BOOKED FLIGHTS TO COUNTRIES WITH CASES OF CORONAVIRUS DISEASE (COVID-19) TO REBOOK OR REFUND THEIR SCHEDULED FLIGHTS FOR FREE
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, PRECIOUS HIPOLITO
DATE FILED : 2020-03-02
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION ON 2020-03-04
